name: Cash-Out
description:
Cash-Out is a 2D top-down survival game, where you need to run away with your cash from money-grabbers. Controlls: Arrow keys or WASD.

How to play: Avoid the enemies and flying objects. Use itens in the world to help you survive longer.

Tools Used:

  • Unity3D
  • Piskel
  • OpenMPT
  • GIMP
  • ASEPRITE

Created by:

  • Fábio Barbosa
  • Élerson Palermo
  • André Lima
